name: [Arcolabs] Game Do Corinthians
description:
Game do Corinthians is a mobile match-3 game developed by Arcolabs for the brazilian soccer team Sport Club Corinthians Paulista, aka Corinthians. It's a game that tells the team's story, aproaching the club to it's fans. Also Game do Corinthians have a few mini-games, and even more coming, to entertaint the players meanwhile they are out of life in the main game.

Credits Producers:

Fabio Marzullo

Augusto Regalla

Game Designer:

Julye Corrêa

Artists:

Ana Rangel

Duda Campos

Developers:

Gabriel Ribeiro

René Abreu

Rogério Medeiros Dias

Sound Designers:

João Gabriel Rodrigues ("JohnnyR")

Matheus Negreiro

Music by:

João Gabriel Rodrigues ("JohnnyR")

Voices by:

Matheus Negreiro
